item.title: How does SoS compare with other workflow engines
item.description: Over 200 workflow systems have been developed to date. Like any other software tools, many workflow systems are actively evolving with new features added from time to time…

item.title: SoS: a cure to pipelineitis
item.description: Because of the needs to use libraries and tools in different languages and to execute them on different systems such as computer clusters, bioinformaticians write a lot of scripts in different languages and face many challenges in developing, running, managing, sharing, and reproducing bioinformatic data…

item.title: SoS Notebook
item.description: I started to use IPython, and then Jupyter more than ten years ago but despite of all the nice features, there were always something missing, something that prevented me from using it as my main working…
